title: Former Broadneck student killed in college shooting remembered as fun-loving, peaceful, happy
text:
Published By: Baltimore Sun: Breaking - Today 
Colin Brough, who attended Broadneck from 2009-11, was fatally shot Friday at Northern Arizona University...
